name: Project Unrest
description: Egyptian Pyramids are truly one of the greatest achievements of human"s history. But have you ever thought what was the cost? We are pretty sure it was one of the hardest time for residents of ancient egypt. In our small strategic game you are able to build this marvelous sights but you should be careful. Residents of your kingdom will probably be against your plans on building them. Will the authorities manage to fulfill this project without facing a rebellion? Raise money, get stones and "hire" workers but do not forget about the unrest!
